CustomField.description: Indicates that the assignee has a delegate approver setup in the system. Delegate Approver will be notified, and, will be permitted to take action on the request.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that the assignee has a delegate approver setup in the system. Delegate Approver will be notified, and, will be permitted to take action on the request.
CustomField.label: Has Delegate Approver
